title: Go Undercover for a Story
description: For a major investigation, a reporter needs to go undercover (e.g., get a job at a company) to expose wrongdoing. This requires extensive planning and ethical review.

tasks.description: Develop a detailed proposal for the undercover assignment, including the goals, risks, and a cover story.
Submit the proposal to senior editors and legal counsel for ethical and legal review and approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: The high-risk assignment is approved through the proper channels.

tasks.description: Establish secure communication methods to be used while undercover to protect the reporter and the investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Secure communication protocols are in place.
